services.title: Web Design
services.description: Specializing in creating visually stunning and highly functional websites, the focus is on enhancing the aesthetic appeal of your online presence while ensuring a seamless and engaging user experience. From responsive design to interactive features, these websites are built to captivate visitors and drive results for your business.

services.title: Landing Page Services
services.description: Elevate your online presence with custom-coded landing pages designed to engage and convert. As a front-end developer, I specialize in creating visually appealing and responsive landing pages tailored to your business needs. Whether you're launching a new product or promoting a special offer, my expertly crafted landing pages will help you achieve your goals.

aboutpara: Hey there‚ú® I'm Stephanie! A Front End developer and illustrator dedicated to creating and designing websites that help businesses reach a wider audience.
aboutpara2: When I'm not working, you can find me spending time with my dogs or exploring new places. Thanks for stopping by!
